From: "JUSPAY" To: {to_mail} Subject: Monthly Payments Performance Report for {end} 2021 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-type: Multipart/Mixed; boundary="NextPart" --NextPart Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="sub_NextPart" --sub_NextPart Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable Dear Merchant Partner, Merchant ID : {mid} Please find below the Monthly Payments Report Card for the month of {end} 2021. In case of any queries, please reach out to us at support@juspay.in. NOTE: Some mail clients may not properly view HTML attachments; please download the document for the best experience. Thanks and Regards, Team Juspay --sub_NextPart Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
